subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The slumping Buffalo Sabres called up the high-scoring rookie center Nathan Gerbe from their A.H.L. affiliate. Gerbe, who is 5 feet 6 inches and 160 pounds, is second on Portland with 24 points (14 goals, 10 assists) in 21 games. The Sabres are 3-9-1 in their last 13 games.
